title: On Christmas i got 2 $10 RP cards but they one of them won't work
body: I got 2 $10 RP Cards on Christmas but one of them won't work. Can you try to fix the problem please? Thank you very much.

replies.body:
You'll need to submit a support request through our support site: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Make sure you include pictures of the back of the cards as it will speed up the resolution time of your issue.
